error.title: Error page!

http.403: You are not authorized to access this page.
http.405: The HTTP verb you used is not supported for this URL.

error.concurrencyFailure: Another user modified this data at the same time as you. Your changes were rejected.
error.general: Something went wrong, please try again.

import.header.mandatory: Mandatory columns should be specified in the imported file: {{param}}
import.header.duplicated: The column {{param}} is duplicated in the header
import.file.empty: The file has no data to import - please verify and try again
